video_identification.title: Al-Jazeera English - Remembering the Balfour Declaration - Dr Salman Abu Sitta talk

extracted_metadata.title: Al-Jazeera English - Remembering the Balfour Declaration - Dr Salman Abu Sitta talk
extracted_metadata.description: The Balfour Declaration was signed 99 years ago today, pledging a Jewish homeland in historic Palestine. We're talking to Palestinian historian Dr. Salman Abu-Sitta. What do you want to ask him about Palestine?
